'''Leaves in the Wind''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] with the 5 Star [[Character]] "Scarlet Leaves Pursue Wild Waves" [[Kaedehara Kazuha]] ({{Anemo}}) as the promoted character with an increased chance to be obtained.

==History==
{{Wish History Table}}

==Trivia==
* All occurrences of this Wish Series have run alongside an [[Epitome Invocation]] Wish featuring [[Freedom-Sworn]], a weapon tailored to Kaedehara Kazuha's gameplay mechanics.
